## Erc20.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Erc20` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(contractWrapper: ContractWrapper<T>, storage: IStorage, options?: SDKOptions);
```

| --------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------------- |
